Revision Properties

Use the Properties dialog box (File | Properties) to view revision, version label, and promotion group information.

Field Descriptions

Revision Tab
Checked in The date and time the file was last checked in for the specified revision.
Modified The date and time the file was last modified for the specified revision.
Author The user ID of the person who checked in the revision.
Locked by The user ID of the person who has placed a lock on the revision.
Description The description entered when the file was checked in; enter changes as necessary.
Version Labels Tab
Version Label A list of all version labels applied to the selected revision, and the revision number.
Promotion Groups Tab
Promotion Group A list of all promotion groups applied to the selected revision, and the revision number.

See Also
